TopicTitle: When I try to download KSP from the KSP store site, I am redirected to main page instead.

Articles.Content:
Good evening. I am attempting to redownload KSP, and I bought it on the KSP store back in the day. Every time I go to the store, log in, and hit my account, I am redirected back to the landing page for the domain. I have tried this on multiple browsers across multiple PCs from various locations, so it doesn't appear to be a problem on my end. (I even dumped my DNS trying to make sure.)

Any effort so I can access my download link for my purchased copy would be greatly appreciated.

1 hour ago, jrsteensen said:

Good evening. I am attempting to redownload KSP, and I bought it on the KSP store back in the day. Every time I go to the store, log in, and hit my account, I am redirected back to the landing page for the domain. I have tried this on multiple browsers across multiple PCs from various locations, so it doesn't appear to be a problem on my end. (I even dumped my DNS trying to make sure.)

Any effort so I can access my download link for my purchased copy would be greatly appreciated.

There was an announcement a few days ago (a banner on the forum) saying the store would be unavailable for a little while. Should be back up soon!

Ah perfect! Was just coming back to KSP after a significant break, so missed that.

Thanks for the information.
